name: Reciprocal Public License 1.1
body:

10 High Risk Activities. THE LICENSED SOFTWARE IS NOT FAULT-TOLERANT AND IS NOT DESIGNED,

11 Responsibility for Claims. As between Licensor and Contributors, each party is responsible for

12 Termination. This License and all rights granted hereunder will terminate immediately in the

13 Miscellaneous.
